mapper.select: SELECT SUM(IF(month = 'Jan', total, 0)) AS 'Jan', SUM(IF(month = 'Feb', total, 0)) AS 'Feb', SUM(IF(month = 'Mar', total, 0)) AS 'Mar', SUM(IF(month = 'Apr', total, 0)) AS 'Apr', SUM(IF(month = 'May', total, 0)) AS 'May', SUM(IF(month = 'Jun', total, 0)) AS 'Jun', SUM(IF(month = 'Jul', total, 0)) AS 'Jul', SUM(IF(month = 'Aug', total, 0)) AS 'Aug', SUM(IF(month = 'Sep', total, 0)) AS 'Sep', SUM(IF(month = 'Oct', total, 0)) AS 'Oct', SUM(IF(month = 'Nov', total, 0)) AS 'Nov', SUM(IF(month = 'Dec', total, 0)) AS 'Dec', SUM(total) AS total_yearly FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(pay_date, "%b") AS month, SUM(buy_amount) AS total FROM pay p LEFT JOIN buy b ON b.pay_no=p.pay_no WHERE pay_date <= NOW() AND pay_date >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 12 month) AND b.prod_no IN(#{prodNo}) AND b.buy_code IN('paid') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(pay_date, "%m-%Y")) AS sub
